Method Detail

drawSample

public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Integer> drawSample(int size,
                                                          int maximum)
Draws a set if size size of sample number from 0 to maximum, following an even distribution. Each drawn number is unique.

Parameters:
size - the size of the sample set
maximum - the maximum number
Returns:
a set of randomly sampled numbers in [0,maximum], null if the request is not possible.
